recipes.title: Tomato Soup
recipes.instructions: Cook chopped tomatoes, onion, and garlic. Blend until smooth. Season with salt, pepper, and basil.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. Mix eggs and cheese. Cook bacon. Combine everything.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.instructions: Mash the avocado and spread it on toasted bread slices. Season with salt, pepper, and a drizzle of lemon juice if desired.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients to form a batter. Cook spoonfuls on a hot, greased griddle, flipping when bubbles form.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients together. Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice on top.

recipes.title: Bean Soup
recipes.instructions: Cook all ingredients in a pot until beans are tender.

recipes.title: Vegan Tacos
recipes.instructions: Assemble tacos by placing beans, corn, avocado, salsa, and lettuce on tortillas.

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa. Mix with vegetables, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.instructions: Spread sauce on dough, add slices of mozzarella, and bake. Garnish with fresh basil and a drizzle of olive oil.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. Sauté garlic and red pepper flakes in olive oil, mix with spaghetti, and garnish with parsley.

recipes.title: Margarita Pizza
recipes.instructions: Spread tomato sauce over pizza dough, add slices of mozzarella, and basil. Drizzle with olive oil and a pinch of salt. Bake until crust is golden.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Stir fry mixed vegetables with soy sauce, ginger, and garlic in olive oil.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken, then slice it. Mix with Caesar dressing, lettuce, and cheese, then wrap in a tortilla.

recipes.title: Homemade Granola
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients and bake until crispy. Let it cool, and store in an airtight container.

recipes.title: Classic BLT Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Cook bacon, assemble sandwich with lettuce, tomato, bacon, and mayonnaise between bread slices.

recipes.title: Egg Salad
recipes.instructions: Mash boiled eggs, mix with mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper, and chives.

recipes.title: Cobb Salad
recipes.instructions: Chop and mix all ingredients in a large bowl.

recipes.title: Vegetable Curry
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in oil, add vegetables, curry powder, and coconut milk. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

recipes.title: Baked Salmon
recipes.instructions: Season salmon with lemon, oil, salt, and pepper. Bake until cooked through.

recipes.title: Garlic Bread
recipes.instructions: Spread butter mixed with garlic powder and parsley on baguette slices. Bake until crispy.

recipes.title: Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions and garlic, add tomatoes and broth, simmer. Blend until smooth, return to heat, add cream and butter.

recipes.title: Fruit Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix chopped fruits with yogurt and honey.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with croutons, Parmesan, and Caesar dressing.

recipes.title: Granola and Yogurt
recipes.instructions: Layer yogurt and granola in a bowl or glass. Top with your choice of fruits and a drizzle of honey.

recipes.title: Veggie Omelette
recipes.instructions: Beat the eggs and season with salt and pepper. Sauté vegetables in oil, then pour eggs over vegetables. Cook until eggs are done.

recipes.title: Vegetable Curry
recipes.instructions: Cook mixed vegetables with coconut milk and curry powder. Season with salt. Serve over cooked rice.

recipes.title: Baked Ziti
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta and mix with marinara sauce and ricotta. Top with mozzarella and Parmesan. Bake until cheese is melted.

recipes.title: Lentil Soup
recipes.instructions: Cook lentils with chopped vegetables in vegetable broth. Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.instructions: Layer sliced tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

recipes.title: Chocolate Smoothie
recipes.instructions: Blend all ingredients together until smooth.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Mix with rice and tomato sauce. Stuff bell peppers with the mixture and bake.

recipes.title: Garden Salad
recipes.instructions: Toss mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and carrots with balsamic vinaigrette.

recipes.title: Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Spread peanut butter on one bread slice and jelly or jam on the other. Press together to form a sandwich.

recipes.title: Veggie Tacos
recipes.instructions: Sauté bell peppers and onions. Assemble tacos with beans, corn, sautéed vegetables, and salsa.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Butter the bread slices, place cheese between them, and grill until the bread is toasted and the cheese is melted.

recipes.title: Pasta Primavera
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté vegetables and garlic in olive oil, then mix with pasta and top with parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Veggie Burger
recipes.instructions: Cook the veggie patty as per package instructions. Assemble the burger with lettuce, tomato, ketchup, and mustard.
